name: Private tour - Messy but amazing Ho Chi Minh city
description:
Come here to see why all sellers try to show their products to streets, 
why motorbikes keep moving in red light, why drivers hoot all the time, 
why we are a developing country but in top of happiness index. You will 
see the difference from any city you have been because beside all messy 
stuffs are warmest hearts of local people.
